inclusion.criterion: histologically confirmed malignancy that is metastatic or unresectable and for which standard curative or palliative measures do not exist or are no longer effective.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Disease must be measurable or evaluable by RECIST criteria.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Life expectancy of at least 3 months.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have normal organ and marrow function as defined below:
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Absolute neutrophil count greater or equal to 1,500/μl;
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Total bilirubin, less or equal to 1.5 X upper limit of normal (ULN);
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: AST(SGOT)/ALT(SGPT)less or equal to 2.5 X ULN less or equal to 5 X ULN if known hepatic metastases;
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Creatinine clearance greater or equal to 50 mL/min/m2 for patients with creatinine levels (by Cockroft-Gault equation or 24 hour urine;
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have had radiation therapy, hormonal therapy, biologic therapy, or chemotherapy for cancer within the 28 days prior to day 1 of the study.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients with known CNS metastases or centrally-located non-small cell lung cancer.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Inadequately controlled hypertension (defined as systolic blood pressure >150 and/or diastolic blood pressure > 100 mmHg)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer with worsening dysphagia, poor oral intake, weight loss, and lethargy. Patient has received radiation therapy in the past.
